Trade/Device Name(s): Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) assay kit
Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) assay calibrator set
Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) assay control set
Regulation Name(s): C-reactive protein, Antigen, Antiserum and Control
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Diazyme high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) assay and related calibrator/control sets using latex-enhanced immunoturbidimetric technology for CRP measurement
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of C-reactive protein (CRP) in human serum and plasma on automated clinical chemistry analyzers; detection and evaluation of inflammatory disorders, infection, and tissue injury; calibrator set for assay calibration and control set for quality control.
